selected_quotes: Goodbye Leonard, you helped us see the world in a new light
Farewell, Leonard Cohen. You brought us so much light.
Leonard Cohen has died – his death is such a loss in a year of so many losses
Thank you Leonard, you helped us see the world in a new light
His death seems such a loss in a year of so many losses.

citation.abstract: Leonard Cohen, who has died at 82, had both a tragic vision and a voice that was warm, funny and closely observant. His unique gaze helped fans see the world anew.
citation.title: Goodbye Leonard, you brought us so much light

news.title: Goodbye Leonard, you brought us so much light
news.summary: Updated November 11, 2016 18:18:53 Leonard Cohen has died, and the lights have gone out all around the world.

news.title: 4 possible reasons why most of the election polls were wrong
news.summary: In the US presidential election, the final poll of polls compiled by Real Clear Politics predicted that Hillary Clinton would win 46.8% of the popular vote and Donald Trump 43.6%.

news.title: Goodbye Leonard, you brought us so much light
news.summary: LEONARD Cohen has died, and the lights have gone out all around the world. His death shouldn't have come as any surprise: as he wrote to his muse Marianne, just weeks ago, we are really so old and our bodies are falling apart and I think I will…

news.title: 4 possible reasons why most of the election polls were wrong
news.summary: In the US presidential election, thefinal poll of pollscompiled by Real Clear Politics predicted that Hillary Clinton would win 46.8% of the popular vote and Donald Trump 43.6%.In the end, Clinton won 47.7% and her rival won 47.5%.
